title: Cozy GARDEN LEVEL One Bedroom Apartment For Rent w/Utilities&Parking
posting_body: ['Available:10/1/2022', 'Heat/ hot water / trash removal/ off street parking included in the rent.', 'Garden Level Apartment - Carpets - Updated Kitchen/Bathroom - Will be Fully Painted', 'Very Responsive Maintenance Superintendent On-Site', 'On-Site Coin-Op Laundry ( in the building)', 'Pet Policy: Cats Allowed ,', 'Sorry No Dogs', 'One Year Lease', "FIRST MONTH/ LAST MONTH / BROKER'S FEE  required to move in.", 'Must Have Very Good Credit', 'Proof of Sufficient Income Will Be Required', 'Sq.', 'Ft: 650', 'For more information, please contact Blaise S. at The Rental Group,', 'at (774) 280 46 04 - Call or Text', 'The Rental Group', '127 Mass Ave', 'Arlington, MA', 'Towns Arlington, Medford, Somerville,Watertown,Belmont,Winchester,Lexington,Woburn and Surrounding.', 'Prices subject to change depending on move date and/or number of occupants.', ' Some pictures may be of comparable unit.']
